EmailTemplate.name: Delay Logic - OBC 1 Warning - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: [URGENT]: Scheduling your first Onboarding Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
A very warm welcome once again to Zeitgold! I have noticed that you have not yet scheduled your first Onboarding Call with me.
In order to ensure your start date with Zeitgold will be the [START DATE], please schedule a call by the [OBC1 DELAY DATE].
If you still have not scheduled a call by this date, we will unfortunately have to postpone our cooperation until the [01.DELAY MONTH.YEAR].
You can book a call using the following link: [ONB OWNER OBC1 CALENDLY LINK]
If you have any questions, we are available at any time at service@zeitgold.com or 030/30808111. I look forward to accompanying your through our Onboarding Process!
All my best,
{{{Sender.FirstName}}} at Zeitgold
